title: prepaid card
body: guys i need help i live in greece i buy a prepaid card here but its say only for eune and my acount is in euwest and i cant take now my money back maybe u can help me some how ???

replies.body: RP Cards are specific to each region, meaning the code cannot be unlocked elsewhere.  We can review your specific issue through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and see if we can find some options.  You may need to include additional information about your card in your ticket like the code and region.  Our billing team will respond to your ticket as soon as possible!
